td.content: s:pt presents with 11 months history of critical lower extremity weakness and numbness. he is a 73 yr old white male. he denies ever using cigarettes he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 68 in, Weight 155 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Neuro = 5/5 strength U/E, 4/5 strength L/E, five beat clonus and upgoing toes B/L, light touch sensation diminished in both legs, upto midabdominal level a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

td.content: s:a male aged 73 ys presents with 5 weeks history of critical urinary incontinence, critical lower extremity weakness and numbness, critical pain radiating from the back to the torso and Body Aches. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life ocas ETOH on w/e o:Height 68 in, Weight 154 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, Back = midthoracic spine tenderness to palpation and percussion a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Prednisone - 60 mg po qd am x 3 week, JEVTANA - 60 MG/1.5 IV q 3 weeks, and ordered Spinal Disc Replacement - L4, L5.

td.content: s:pt c/o 5 weeks h/o critical lower extremity weakness and numbness (not checked), critical pain radiating from the back to the torso, critical urinary incontinence. NKDA. pt is a M retired aged 74 years. o:Height 68 in, Weight 152 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, Neuro = 5/5 strength U/E, 4/5 strength L/E, five beat clonus and upgoing toes B/L, light touch sensation diminished in both legs, upto midabdominal level a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:patient presents with progressive critical urinary incontinence, critical lower extremity weakness and numbness and critical pain radiating from the back to the torso for past 4 weeks. he is a 74 YO male retired. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 68 in, Weight 153 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Neuro = 5/5 strength U/E, 4/5 strength L/E, five beat clonus and upgoing toes B/L, light touch sensation diminished in both legs, upto midabdominal level a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Prednisone - 60 mg po qd am x 3 week, JEVTANA - 60 MG/1.5 IV q 3 weeks.
